introduction: SYNOPSISAfter going from the embraces of one man to another, Kyung-ah passes out. Young-ho discovers her and takes her to his apartment where he warmly takes care of her. However, Kyung-ah refuses to be rescued by Young-ho and returns to her depraved life. Young-ho collapses from exhaustion. He learns that he only has six months left to live. Kyung-ah believes that she has to take care of him so she works hard to nurse him. Then she learns that Young-ho is the son of a conglomerate CEO. Feeling betrayed, Kyung-ah declares that she's going to leave him. Young-ho's father shows up at this time and begs her to stay with his son but Kyung-ah leaves, holding back tears.故事扬·霍被发现昏倒而gyeongah参观了男人的诸兵种应该照顾升温到他的公寓。但gyeongah已经回落到生活，不接受求爱扬·霍。扬·霍已经从过度劳累倒下被认为是六个月sihanbu生活，gyeongah认为，郑荣，他们应该关心和护理硬。但要注意，扬·霍父集团，gyeongah感到被出卖了唯一的儿子宣告破发。然后就出现郑荣的父亲恳求像他的儿子，但gyeongah叶褪色大哭。
